Rye Bread.author: unknown
Rye Bread.description: Freshly baked rye bread with a crispy crust and tender crumb. An ideal combination for breakfast or a snack.

Baguette.author: breadmaker
Baguette.description: Fluffy and aromatic baguette, perfect for making sandwiches and snacks. An excellent choice for a light snack.

Italian Ciabatta.author: Italian baker
Italian Ciabatta.description: Authentic Italian ciabatta made according to the traditional recipe. The crispy crust and soft center make it an ideal choice for pasta or sandwiches.

French Croissant.author: French chef
French Croissant.description: Light and crispy French croissant that melts in your mouth. The exquisite taste and aroma will uplift your mood any time of the day.

Family Bread.author: homemade baker
Family Bread.description: Traditional recipe of family bread passed down from generation to generation. Each slice is filled with care and the warmth of a home kitchen.

Danish Pastry.author: Danish confectioner
Danish Pastry.description: Airy and tender Danish pastry with a filling of fruit glaze. An excellent choice for a sweet snack or a cup of coffee.

Chocolate Cake.author: master confectioner
Chocolate Cake.description: Exquisite chocolate cake with cream that will make you forget all your worries. Enjoy every piece of impeccable taste.

Strawberry Pie.author: baker Ivan
Strawberry Pie.description: Aromatic pie with strawberries, fresh creamy cream, and a thin layer of sponge cake. An ideal choice for lovers of fruity desserts.

Honey Cake.author: grandmother's recipe
Honey Cake.description: Tender and sweet honey cake prepared according to an ancient family recipe. Feel the taste of childhood and the warmth of a home bakery.

Truffle Cake.author: pastry chef-chocolatier
Truffle Cake.description: Luxurious truffle cake with raspberries, sprinkled with delicate chocolate shavings. Refined taste and exquisite decoration.

Pistachio Cake.author: professional confectioner
Pistachio Cake.description: Exquisite pistachio cake with caramel and tender cream. A luxurious combination of flavors that will leave you in awe.

Raspberry Tart.author: fruit gourmet
Raspberry Tart.description: Juicy raspberry tart with fresh fruits and a delicate cream. A light and refreshing dessert for true taste connoisseurs.

Cherry Strudel.author: Chef Anna
Cherry Strudel.description: Juicy bun with cherries, covered with delicate glaze and aromatic spices. A portion of joy and comfort in every bite.

Croissant.author: test baker
Croissant.description: Tender and aromatic puff pastry filled with butter and vanilla cream. An ideal choice for a sweet start to the day.

Chocolate Donut.author: chef patissier
Chocolate Donut.description: Fluffy donut with chocolate filling and crispy sprinkles. Enjoyment and pleasure in every bite.

Eclair Pastry.author: French confectioner
Eclair Pastry.description: Tender eclair pastry with aromatic cream and chocolate glaze. Luxurious delight for true gourmets.

Cream Puff.author: young baker
Cream Puff.description: Classic cream puff with delicate custard cream and delicious toppings. An ideal treat for any occasion.

Butter Cookies.author: novice baker
Butter Cookies.description: Beloved homemade butter cookies, prepared with love and care. Tender and aromatic delight for the whole family.

Cappuccino.author: coffee lover
Cappuccino.description: Creamy cappuccino with frothy milk foam and aromatic coffee flavor. An ideal morning treat for coffee connoisseurs.

Latte.author: coffeemaker
Latte.description: Soft and velvety latte with exquisite milk flavor and espresso aroma. A luxurious coffee drink for true connoisseurs.

Espresso.author: espresso barista
Espresso.description: Aromatic and strong espresso with intense flavor and the aroma of bitter coffee beans. An ideal treat for coffee lovers.

Macchiato.author: coffee connoisseur
Macchiato.description: Intense and rich macchiato with milk foam and a bright coffee flavor. An ideal combination for lovers of strong coffee.

Americano.author: coffee addict
Americano.description: Classic and strong americano with deep coffee flavor and rich aroma. An ideal invigorating treat for the whole day.

Flat White.author: Flat White enthusiast
Flat White.description: Soft and aromatic Flat White with velvety milk flavor and intense coffee aroma. Luxurious pleasure for gourmets.

Frappe.author: mixologist
Frappe.description: Refreshing frappe with a light sourness and the aroma of fresh fruits. An ideal choice for a hot day or a light morning snack.

Smoothie.author: fruit enthusiast
Smoothie.description: Healthy and fruity smoothie with vitamins and freshness. An ideal treat for all fruit drink lovers.

Chocolate Milkshake.author: chocolate lover
Chocolate Milkshake.description: Indulgent chocolate milkshake with a tender milk flavor and a burning cocoa aroma. A portion of sweet pleasure for sweet tooths.

Mojito.author: bartender
Mojito.description: Classic and refreshing mojito with fragrant mint, sour lime, and sweet cane syrup. An ideal refreshment for thirst.

Pina Colada.author: tropical drink expert
Pina Colada.description: Tropical delight in a glass - Pina Colada with pineapple juice, coconut cream, and rum. An ideal choice for evening relaxation.

Margarita.author: tequila lover
Margarita.description: Sharp and aromatic Margarita cocktail with lemon juice, triple sec, and tequila. Real Latin American pleasure.
